ygData.subject: Freeport Shadowknight Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a troll shadowknight currently in steamfont mountains. I m level 10 and just wondering if when I get to 15 if I can get spells and train and such at the
ygData.messageBody:
I am a troll shadowknight currently in steamfont mountains. I'm level 10 and
just wondering if when I get to 15 if I can get spells and train and such at
the sk guild in freeport or will I bee KOS for being a troll? I made it
through the underground alright on my way to docks and no npc's killed me. I
dont reaelly NEED med at 12 so I'll wait till 15, none of our spells take
elots of mana anyways except invis and our pet but those arent cast a lot
anyways.

Gaukan
~Erollisi Marr
